abstract: Infectious disease specialist Dr Jacques Pepin attempts to trace AIDS virus to its earliest beginnings, decades before it was noticed, in new book The Origin of AIDS.
snippet: In “The Origins of AIDS,” Dr. Jacques Pépin starts from 1900 to work out the most likely path the virus took during the years it left almost no tracks.
lead_paragraph: In “The Origins of AIDS,” Dr. Jacques Pépin starts from 1900 to work out the most likely path the virus took during the years it left almost no tracks.

headline.main: Chimp to Man to History Books: The Path of AIDS
headline.print_headline: Chimp to Human To History Books: The Path of AIDS
headline.seo: Chimp to Human to History Books: The Circuitous Path of AIDS
